name: FacilitiesCrossing
overview:
The World’s Premier Job Aggregation Service

Headquartered in Pasadena, California, with offices throughout the world, FacilitiesCrossing locates and classifies jobs on every source it can find and provides its highly specialized research to job seekers, recruiters and other job sites throughout North America.
